website_summaries.verdict: While it has some nice features, it's also pricey and slow, and you may end up frustrated if you need customer service.
pros: PRISM technology helps reduce inaccuracies, as it uses replaceable sensor modules instead of manual calibration
cons: Slow to boot and read -– users have reported up to 2 minutes to get results

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bactrack device and it didnt work. Amazon sent me the same model at no cost and the 2nd one didnt work. Amazon gave my money back and they both went in the trash. I have an intoxalock interlock device in my truck and cant blow over .03 and so far for the 1st two weeks it has been accurate. I would definately reccomend if you are in the same position as me.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! It's been very reliable. I follow the directions and allow plenty of time between eating and drinking and using the breathalyzer. I think this is the issue others have with the sensors failing. Results seem to be very accurate when I blow lightly into the unit. When I blow hard I get lower BAC values. Its small size, included carrying pouch and internal mouthpiece storage make it easy to transport. It has been a great tool to double-check BAC levels before driving.
customer_reviews.author: N1CK

customer_reviews.title: Awful. I used this device to check my blood ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful. I used this device to check my blood alcohol content before using a vehicle interlock device. It would constantly read my blood alcohol content incorrectly and cause me to believe I had an allowable blood alcohol content to start my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Eilert

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a need to have!!!
customer_reviews.text: This model works very well and lets you know if you are within the legal limit to drive. It has a use meter when you first turn it on to let you know how many times you've used it. Great when trying to determine when the module will need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LiveSaver in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Yes I do have a breathalyzer in my car. I use this every morning just to be safe and avoid any violations. This unit is very accurate and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: maphis

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate, Level kept changing every couple times I would blow into it
customer_reviews.author: A&A

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer is accurate. I have a state issued breathalyzer in my car so I make sure to use my AlcoMate Premium before I step into my vehicle and it has not failed me..
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Schag

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! The Perfect Breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: I spend A LOT of time reviewing all the different Breathalyzer's on the market and in the end chose this one for a few different reasons: *Small and compact (about the size of an iPod) *No need to send the unit off to recalibrate (just order a new "AlcoMate Premium Sensor Module", pop it in and your done) *VERY simple to use, only one button to worry about *Very accurate (we actually had the opportunity to test it against a $800 unit) *Good reviews from several websites comparing different makes and models *Comes with a nice small discrete black neoprene-like cover
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, but dropped it once and it no longer worked. Customer support has been non existent. Tried via chat and their direct email with no response
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: We use this breathalyzer at our company and it works great and it is affordable enough that we can have one at each of our locations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Month of Use and It's Broken - Please Help
customer_reviews.text: This device worked very well - accurate and easy to use - for one month. Now it's completely broken and I can't use it. Please accept an exchange or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. Me and my wife tested 20+ times and results varied between .03-.04. don't use if you want accurate results.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Takes Forever
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with the accuracy of this product. It seems to estimate BAC from breath great. I do have a problem with how long it takes for you to get a measurement. It takes about 2 minutes to take a reading. That's a long time compared to the older version (30 seconds). Since most people want an average of 3 readings. That's 6 minutes. It's almost like they're trying to make you wait so long that you sober up. I liked their older version better.
customer_reviews.author: engineering student

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Use this on a regular basis. seems to run quite a bit on the high side, but I guess better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and I think it is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely user friendly and accurate. User must breath for ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely user friendly and accurate. User must breath for an extended time at a steady rate or receives flow rate error message which is the only negative..
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable readings as long as you keep the batteries fresh and the sensors replaced on schedule. Can be a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this item for about 3 weeks now. When I go out with my friends we all use it, which is great entertainment. It's scary how inebriated you really are when you feel almost sober!! This item is reliable, but there is one draw back. You have to stop drinking for 15-20 minutes before you blow. They are not kidding about this. If you blow within just a few minutes, you'll get some very erroneous readings.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stipsky

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good product and is a great idea to own one if you go out and have drinks! The one concern I have would be with any BAT you can buy; you need to wait 30 minutes after you eat or drink anything or the reading can be off. Not very practical for most casual gatherings. As a father of a three year old, I would say: BUY ONE AND DON'T DRIVE UNDER THE INFLUENCE!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no problems ever. these are the ones we use in the USMC and they work amazingly
customer_reviews.author: timothy jaquet

customer_reviews.title: Effective but erratic
customer_reviews.text: The alcomate can give erratic and contradictory readings. I think this may occur when the batteries are low. Without more experience i'd neither recommend nor discourage the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: DavidNZ

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Please read!! This device is extremely accurate. However, you can't take a shot then expect it to function properly, actually you might ruin its accuracy. Wait 10 minutes or so before using it and it'll be worth it's weight in gold. I can blow a .068, hand it to my girl and it'll blow .000, then blow again and get a .068. It works very well and I'm probably going to buy another so I can keep one in the house and not have to go to the car to see if I'm alright to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, portable
customer_reviews.text: While this unit is a little pricey, I like the idea of replacing the sensor every so often. I can't really attest to the accuracy, but it does seem to read well. Best used as a screening device.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and no “have to send in” calibration needed - worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product and no “have to send in” calibration needed - worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyBikerChick

customer_reviews.title: It does the job although the priming time is kind of a drag but you'll have that with anyone of these
customer_reviews.text: It does the job although the priming time is kind of a drag but you'll have that with anyone of these
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Reproducible results and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have owned this for a few weeks and have used it a couple dozen times. It seems very solidly made and the readings seem reasonable, given our alcohol intake, and reproducible (within about a 5% range). A suggestion that seems sensible, although not in the instructions and I can't prove its importance, is to take in a moderately deep breath, hold it for 5-10 seconds, breath slowly out and then start to breath into the breathalyzer without stopping your expiration. This would seem to best assure a reproducible measurement of an equilibrated air sample from deep in your lungs and not from the trachea, which could represent fresh air that you have just inspired.
customer_reviews.author: Hope this helps

customer_reviews.title: Accurate if used correctly. A good investment. Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research before I bought this product and so I had high expectations when I received it. It seems to be very accurate as long as you have waited 40 minutes or so since your last drink (and it sometimes helps to rinse your mouth with water first too for more accuracy). It is very reliable and easy to carry in my purse and very lightweight. I'd reccommend it. Pricey, but a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Interesting AF

customer_reviews.title: A person in Denver who thinks of safety
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Works wonderful and i recommend this breathalyzer to people who drink and think they can drive. We have partys sometimes and we use this breathalyzer to make sure our friends and family leave sober or need someone to driver them home. They think its cool we do that cuz it tells them we care for them and others.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was buying the best. Money was no issue
customer_reviews.text: worked for 3 years, and now craps out. For this much, I expected it to work longer. The sensors give absurdly high readings once they start to wear out and there is no indication of when this starts to occur. I'm not sure how this can be remedied, but when buying, I thought I was buying the best. Money was no issue, and hence I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely inaccurate, tried it with 3 drinks and the reading is zero. Not worth paying for a product like this. Either buy a $40 keychain breathalyzer with same accuracy or a $300 fuel cell.
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: alcoscan7000
customer_reviews.text: I have had earlier versions of breathalysers this one works as advertised. It makes that drive home lots safer. Just read and follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: D. Knoll

customer_reviews.title: The sharp little device comes handy when i need it.
customer_reviews.text: This product passes on my belief system that it can do its junction effectively.rhis PRODUCT Is small, lightweight, and even looks nice.Sensors can be taken of the back cover and replaced when you feel the readings are not accurate enough.Space is not a problem and can be placed anywhere you want (but ideally not in a place where it can be damaged).It brings a tube and everything is well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: mau

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this breathalyzer for a few months after reading reviews. It seems to work just fine, altho readings on the same person in sequence have to be averaged as one may be off enough to matter. I have been very careful to wait the 20 minutes so as not to mess up the sensor. I also like the replacable sensor/no calibration feature. Comes in a nice little bag with 3 or 4 mouthpieces, which look reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Neonebel

customer_reviews.title: AlcoMate Premium
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my son when he turned legal age for drinking. I thought it was proactive to have one for those times that he might go over the limit. He keeps it on hand and has used it a couple of times. Sure enough....he was over and knew he shouldn't drive. I think it's an invaluable item in these days...protects him and others. He said it's easy to use and accurate!
customer_reviews.author: D. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I find it consistent and informative. Once you use it, you have a good idea where the border is, and whether or not you need to check. However, if it is used on different people in short intervals, it seems to encounter problems, so I would not buy it for a party toy. But it sure is excellent for what I presume is its intended use. Great purchase. Plus my wife gave me a hard time for buying it, and now has apologized and thinks it was a terrific purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RT Sender

customer_reviews.title: Must-have
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mine for over a 2 month now and love it. So far it has been very reliable and we play with it daily. Would definitely recommend to a friend! For the price it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: I like this one the best because it is light and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this one the best because it is light and an easy product to use. The sensory chip is quick to get out and it takes barely any effort. The breathalyzer has a simple start up button and it is also very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Angione

customer_reviews.title: Product is very effective and I am very pleased by it's results
customer_reviews.text: Product is very effective and I am very pleased by it's results. Only thing is the size. Other then that. Every responsible drinker should use it.
customer_reviews.author: glenn hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great product
customer_reviews.text: AlcoMate is a great product. Very easy to use and efficient. I would definitely recommend owning one for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Edvin Hot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product easy to use and you don't need to recalibrate and you can change the sensor easily
customer_reviews.author: Jay Olegario

customer_reviews.title: but I am happy that I did
customer_reviews.text: Didnt know what to expect when I got it, but I am happy that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: NO DUI
customer_reviews.text: Got it this xmas! Will drive safe only! thanks! Seems to work well. I would rather test myeself than have a police test me! Know your level! ;)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: wow great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, very useful in the time of need
customer_reviews.author: christopher holmes

product_meta.title: AlcoMate Premium AL7000 | Professional Breathalyzer | US DOT & US Coast Guard Approved | Globally Patented Replaceable Sensor Module | Retail Box
product_meta.description:
The AlcoMate Premium Breathalyzer features one of the most important innovations in the breathalyzer industry - patented PRISM (Pre-calibrated Replaceable Intelligent Sensor Module) Technology. PRISM Technology provides cutting-edge alcohol sensing using the most rigorous standards of construction, durability and accuracy. Typical breathalyzers must be periodically re-calibrated by the manufacturer in order to maintain accurate readings. This is usually done by physically mailing your breathalyzer to a service center, resulting in wasted downtime. On top of that, the re-calibration procedure itself is unable to restore Day 1 accuracy, because the wear and residue buildup inside the sensor is not addressed. Instead of going through a tedious re-calibration process, PRISM Technology allows you to directly replace your old sensor module with a new one; replacement is quick and easy, and you avoid the pitfalls of mail-back re-calibration. When you decide to invest your hard-earned dollars in a breathalyzer, you can make sure your device is as accurate as Day 1 each time you install a new sensor module, only with PRISM Technology. AlcoMate breath alcohol testers are DOT approved for law enforcement accuracy, US Coast Guard cleared, and are the single-source brand for the US Navy.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
support@alcomate.net
feature_bullets: DOT approved for Law Enforcement: Accuracy +/-0.01 at 0.10%BAC
US Coast Guard approved , Detection Range 0.000 - 0.400% BAC G/DL

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
